content: to knit as normal row below yfwd k1 7 sts 2 wrap yarn again around one finger 5th row using knitted method cast on 2 finish bandana main body creating a loop sts purlwise at the beginning of row p3 3 then over the needle and pull through k3 p3 decrease tbl 7 sts continue in patt until 83 sts making sure creating 2 sts on right hand needle 6th row k1 yfwd k3 yfwd k3 decrease 7 to end on a 11th row p1 knit until 1 st 4 slip the 2 sts to left hand needle knit sts from end p1 row together 7th row p1 k5 p1 7 sts cut length of yarn tail and place stitches this part is tricky if you need more the act of casting on and knitting 3 on hold support find the youtube tutorial for the together creates the decorative picot bandana @passiveroyal edge ppaassssiivvee k = knit p = purl sl = slip tbl = through back of loop decrease = together yfwd = yarn forward also known as yarn over rrooyyaall for feedback or support please contact passiveroyal@gmail com
